name: Rolling in the Maze
description:
In "Rolling in the Maze", the player turns into a small ball to solve the maze. In order to reach the end, players need to crack according to the different level mechanisms of each level.

This is a casual game. There are currently 7 levels in the game, and the mechanics of each level are different. Press "A" and "D" on the keyboard to control the rotation of the maze, and the balls in the maze will move due to gravity.
With three stars per level, let's crack the maze.

Game Features


  • Casual maze game

  • 7 levels in the early access version

  • Unique rotation control ball mechanism
